name: Toast Generator
description:
Generate beautifully themed Toast Notifications with 1-Click. Create pre-themed and pre-prepared toast in seconds.


Each toast has auto layout meaning you can update the layout once it has been created with ease.


Work with simple intuitive UI to generate a reusable component.


More features like pre-created toasts, and different variants coming soon...


Any comments and suggestions to improve the plugin are much appreciated. Enjoy!üëç



Note: This is plugin is still a work in progress.


Know Issue: The message does not have a maximum width meaning it will be displayed all in 1 line. (Set the message to size Fixed and drag according to the size you need)
